short_summary: Building Controls System Maintenance - Lethbridge AB
description: The contract: covers four (4) quarterly preventative maintenance visits for an existing Siemen's Controls System at the Lethbridge Research & Development Centre in Lethbridge, Alberta and includes annual fume hood calibration and testing. estimated value of the contract (GST included), is $630,000.00. funds will be disbursed at the time described written, as much or all of all (one), two), three).

full_summary:
# Notice of Intention to Negotiate a Contract

## Project Title

Building Controls System Maintenance - Lethbridge Research & Development Centre

## Reference Number

cb-877-13815511

## Solicitation Number

01R11-24-C055

## Tender Status

Expired

## Project Description

This is an Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN) indicating the intention to award a service contract to a pre-identified supplier for the maintenance of the Building Management System (BMS) at the Lethbridge Research & Development Centre in Lethbridge, Alberta. The BMS is a Siemens controls system consisting of a server, software, and physical operating parts.

## Requirement

The selected contractor will be required to provide on-call services, on-site maintenance, emergency services, equipment installation and decommissioning, panel replacements, technical support, and training. Scheduled maintenance will include quarterly preventative maintenance visits, data backups, network maintenance, and BACnet analysis licenses.

## Statement of Capabilities

Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described may submit a Statement of Capabilities in writing on or before the closing date. The Statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

## Contract Information

* Contract Period: February 1, 2024 to January 31, 2025, with three one-year option periods
* Estimated Value: $630,000 (including GST) for the initial contract period and all option periods
* Pre-identified Contractor: Siemens Canada Ltd.

## Sole Source Justification

The sole source justification is based on the proprietary software and intellectual property owned by Siemens Canada Ltd. The BMS is a custom-designed system, and using any other supplier would require significant re-design and re-installation costs.

## Contact Information

* Name: Zack Flamont, Procurement Officer
* Email: zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (639) 560-3462

## Documents

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28307/01r11-24-c055-acan-english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28307/01r11-24-c055-acan-english.pdf)
* French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28307/01r11-24-c055-acan---f
